taskDescription: Requests the voice assistant to explain new game features when needed
Activates ALFRED voice assistant without hesitation
Listens to detailed explanations of game rules and mechanics
Uses social chat features and invites friends to multiplayer sessions
Allows ALFRED to track physical and cognitive activities using wearables
Accepts frequent notifications and updates from ALFRED
Welcomes ALFRED’s encouragement for social and cognitive engagement
Enjoys spontaneous social interactions facilitated by ALFRED
Explores the ALFRED marketplace on a tablet to find new apps
Installs a new health monitoring app to improve daily routine
Attempts to customize app settings but finds them rigid
Ask ALFRED who is online to chat at the moment
Start a video call with her niece using ALFRED
Explore social media features through ALFRED
Request detailed explanations from ALFRED about chat features
Ask ALFRED to slow down or simplify instructions when learning new functions
Use ALFRED to order a taxi for spontaneous outings
Value transparency and control over the flow of health information
Prefer to maintain independence while getting help from ALFRED
Enjoy mental stimulation from games suggested by ALFRED during chats
Use ALFRED to connect with new acquaintances from interest groups
Listens carefully to explanations about data use and sharing options
Expresses excitement and curiosity about technology and data sharing
Wears and demonstrates wearable sensors to caregiver
Participates actively in ALFRED’s exercise simulations and challenges
Expresses desire for more difficult physical workouts
Enjoys sharing social activity and gaming progress information
Engages warmly with informal caregiver but tolerates clinical detachment from medical staff
Encourages informal caregiver to support her enthusiasm for technology
Straps on the ALFRED-integrated wearable every morning
Asks ALFRED about the exercise list for the day using voice commands
Follows physically demanding exercises suggested by ALFRED
Plays cognitive games recommended by ALFRED to stimulate the mind
Listens to ALFRED’s explanations about health benefits of activities
Allows ALFRED to automatically activate when support is needed
Accepts spontaneous video chat invitations with other exercise enthusiasts
Receives real-time updates from the wearable device
Manages interruptions caused by notifications during social chats
Feels motivated by open sharing and dynamic interaction with ALFRED
